content.detailedDescription:
Husband and i were driving home on a sunday morning from the sw corner of ok,(where we'd been on an overnight visit to see some family)we were going back to okc (we were heading due east)so were the ufo's)...Was near lawton, near the deyo exit....They were flying to the left of us...Saw them in our peripheral vision...Flew quickly even with us, (we could see them our our van window)there were  two shiny silver discs,(maybe side by side)or one just to the side and behind the other, looked like a mirror surface when it reflects the sunshine(they were some distance from us, over a large area of land which was unpopulated, except for a few ranches and/or farms...As they flew, i could see just a portion of them through the side window where my husband was sitting, then they left my vision, as they quickly angled upwards at a very high rate of speed....Left yellow vapor trails, (with a black area (circle) from which the vapor was escaping) my husband was telling me, as i was asking him to describe them to me as they ascended...(they were then out of my line of vision (we were still driving down the highway), as they quickly went out of sight....I truly was puzzled at the sight, i thought maybe it was some new kind of artillery which was being fired at a nearby army base...(not stopping to think had it been that, i would've never been able to see it....) we told our grown children, who think we've 'lost it'......So we don't tell this to many people...I've never believed in ufo's until it happened to us.....(anonymous please)
but it did happen !!!
content.summary: Saw two silver discs flying parallel to the hw then curved sharply upwards at a high rate of speed left a yellow vapor trail, silver-glass-like, huge discs

content.detailedDescription:
at apx. 9:45 in the morning i was heading up to the top of the cul-de-sac from my house on my way to work. wanting to turn right onto the main road, i was blocked by a tan pickup truck pulled and parked askew in the road, its driver still in the cab. i thought nothing of it for a moment as i took the time to shuffle through my cds, but upon looking back up i grew irritated that the driver in front of me had not moved on yet given that i was running late for work. that is until i looked in the direction he also appeared to be looking.
   there past the cornfield and above the distant tree-line was an enormous hovering object gleaming against the cloudless sky. at that time of morning the sun and clear sky are extremely bright, but this object was shining marvelously and unmoving, huge given the distance.
   the other witness and i just sat in our vehicles watching for several minutes. but it was our similar reactions that are most stunning to me. i am a person extremely interested in unexplained phenomena, but had never been witness. furthermore i am not opposed to shrugging off work or being late. with my house just down the street, i had but to run back down the street and grab a camera or at least sit the watching for the duration.
   rather the truck in front of me simply pulled away and i routinely followed, never looking back. even more peculiar, by the time i had reached the stop sign only a short distance down the road. in fact it was not until about six months later that the memory came flooding back as clear as the object had been.
  while talking to my mother one evening the memory finally returned, but with anger and regret that i could have behaved so carelessly, something i could not (nor could anyone else who knows me) have been capable of without some kind of outside influence.
   i know that this account is all but worthless with the lack of evidence and the loss of memory for such a long period of time (something which angers me even today), but it is my story and sworn truth in all accounts.
content.summary: Witnessed huge cigar craft shining bright against morning sky.  object hovered motionlessly high above tree-line for several minutes.  there was one other witness.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my son and wife were sitting in the hot tub when my son said, "do you see that?" my wife and myself look up and see a triangular, translucent / gray, two-dimensional looking shape, almost like it was all wings gliding thought the sky. it moved in a strait path north/west in a direction abnormal to the flight path of other aircraft. it made no sound and had no lights. at first we thought it might be a bird gliding thought the sky, but it was moving way to fast and the wings never flapped. then we thought it could be a hang glider, but it was moving way to fast. we finally lost sight of it as it blended into the night sky. deciding that we could not figure out what it was, we have determined it to be a ufo.
content.summary: It had no lights, no sound, and the color was translusent or gray

content.detailedDescription:
It was late june, possibly early july 1979 when i saw my ufo, across the street from my dad���s farm in roseau, county.  so here goes ��� a personal entry for you to send on to mufon if you like.  i was 22.

late on a june evening (11 pm or so) i wrapped up a scrabble game with my folks and while dad made a nightcap i headed outside for a little air.  it was a clear night with a slight breeze, just enough to get rid of mosquitoes.  (i was home on the farm doing a summer project through college).  my dad farmed about 280 acres

west of the county road 2, about ��� mile south of what is called the summer road.  on the east side of the road is billy hagen���s land (billy now owns dad���s old place, the hemmingson farm back then) .  there is a little grove a bit north of where our road meets country road 2.  bill had the field planted in wheat that summer.

there is a narrow ditch grade to the right of our road, maybe a couple hundred yards or so.  and as i stood by the edge of billy���s field, i saw this little light coming down that ditch grade, maybe 20 feet up or even less.
 

now, there is a little municipal air port in warroad, 12 miles east and another in roseau, 17 miles est.  but this thing made no noise.  and as i stood there i

saw this circle of lights going around it, blue and white i think.  it was small.  and then the object stopped.  that���s when it hit me ��� a ufo.  about this time i also realized everything had gone still ��� the crickets and frogs were silent, like they are when a predator is around.  all i could hear was my heartbeat and the

wind on the wheat.

 

now the object slid left, and then right, in a perfect horizontal plane.  that again confirmed ufo in my mind since i know of nothing else that can move 

like that.  i guess i stood there looking at it for maybe 2 minutes and then, still utterly silent, it arched up into the sky at an impossible speed (very high!) and 

zipped overhead and down the western horizon.  it moved so fast i could scarcely turn my head fast enough and it streaked is moved so fast.

 

afterward i told my father who was very moved by this and we stood out there for some time.  he told me about some of the recent sightings ��� don���t recall if he mentioned the sheriff one at that time but i know i heard about it from my folks  so it was either after this or before it.  there had also been cattle killings and

the vet had never seen anything like them ��� these cattle had no blood and no wounds that he could find (nothing like the ���mutilation��� cases that so many

say are just what animals look like after bloating.  any farmer or vet would know the difference.  don���t know if these were related but a lot of us wondered.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Low flying/hovering lenticular disk with rotating lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my livingroom & watched out my window.I live in the country. i noticed it because the unusual lights like to hover over our near by field. one night recently my mom saw a craft & it hovered over a tree up high & suddenly was gone that quick & cars came out to the field to see what it was afterwards so we heard the next day from others who saw this too.I to date don't believe these are planes because they just sit there as in no movement untill they move sideways or up suddenly not like a helicopter.The lights are not like a plane. they are underneigh several green lights cicling with a white light very bright in the middle. we have been quite shaken for we can't explain what they are & it's quite a shaken feeling to know they are comming back at night. i know were in a flight path for you see regular planes & can tell the difference very well. i have lived here for years & can tell you this has only been noticable since the beginning of december up to now.I'am now trying to get good pictures for someone else to see. if someone can tell me what it is please let me know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 round objects silently stood still with a white light in center with green lights rotating in circle under the disks. then i watched them move in a flash upward & side ways & off they went in a flash. gone in a blink with no notice. i see this often .

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in couch, which  i don't uasually sit in; it
gave me a view of the.
 left window; full view.
i saw a bright light beaming down. in the left side of this
window.
i thought it was helicopter, until i saw it wasn't.
what it was was obscured by the very bright light; but
it wasn't a helicopter which i have seen easily,
but then when it went away, i could see the redights,
rectangular; and it was huge;the length of a bridge.
it traveled east to the delaware river, then south;
i eventually lost sight of it. 
it was a cold, dark moonlesss night and no other
airplanes were in the vicinity. i think because it was
sunday night and cold.

it had to be  a ship, although i couldn't make out the
outline of a ship. but, it wasn't a helicopter or plane or
blimp. i'd never seen anything like that before.
i wasn't on drugs, alcohol, hallucinogen, lsd, or
anything; i was stone cold sober. it was just there.

although airliners circle overhead headed toward
south phila.,(i live in northeast phila,), they're relatively tiny. it wasn't an airliner, and airliners never
beam down a brightlight. it was a ufo.
i'm not making this up; my background is in science and 
i went to colllege, full-time. i majored in science and i'm currently studying computer prgoamming.
unfortunately, i never bought a video  cam.
content.summary: I saw a ship with red lights in the back in a tail-light configuration

content.summary: Well it was triangle shap

content.detailedDescription:
I was in big bend national park. me and a friend left rio grande village after dark, car started fine and the lights were bright. arrived at dugout wells (still within the park) about 30 minutes later, lights still bright on car with no dimness.  turned the car off to listen for owls and other wildlife (just rolled windows down and listened through window).  about 10 minutes later (wanted to move to a better spot and get out of car) tried to start the car but nothing happended, it just went tunk.  not even the normal wa-wa-womp that you hear when you have a low battery.  so i opened my car door to look under the hood, thought maybe i lost a fan belt for the alternator and that is why the car wouldn't start.  i just couldn't imagine that the battery would do nothing when it was fine 10 minutes ago.  when i opened the car door the dome light was bright then dim, then off completely, then dim, then off, then bright, etc. while the door buzzer was going through the same things, normal, weird buzz, no buzz at all.  the radio lights came on then started flashing and freaking out, the radio at one point came on by itself then off by itself.  while i was looking under the hood, the cd player started ejecting then sucking up the cd and didn't stop until i asked my friend to pull it out.  it seemed like the car computer was freaking out for no apparent reason.

a few minutes later we are sitting in the car with the doors closed, we are facing north adn to my left but behind me and behind some cottonwood trees but high in the sky, there is a huge explosion of light that stayed there for several seconds lighting up the sky then streaked towards the earth (towards the chisos moutains which were south and a little west of us).  it reminded me of a flare but it stayed suspended in the sky far longer, was far, far brighter, and it streaked towards the earth at a much faster rate of speed than a flare (because of the parachutes on them). 


moments later, to the east, on the face of a cliff in mexico there was a light glowing, moving and changing colors.  we could make out the outline of the top of the cliff in mexico which i assume was about 30 miles away.  the produced a glow across the desert which encompassed the car and lasted about 20 minutes then disappeared.  the light on the cliff appeared and disappeared many times during this observation.  about 15 minutes later, the light produced a spot light which scanned the desert, including our car.  the spotlight changed colors from white to blue to red.  this lasted for about 10-15 minutes.  after watching the desert "glow" twice from the light on the cliff, i decided to go to bed.  my friend stayed up for a few more hours with the same things happening on the cliff face.  we thought about the lights being border patrol but how could they get a light on the side of a 1000 foot cliff.  and if they could, why did they not check our car out when it was illuminated by spot light and the glow.

the next morning, we hiked to the road, got a ranger to jump start my car.  charged my battery at panther junction gas station for an hour.  the battery would not take a charge at all, i mean it stayed on "zero".  this really puzzles me.  the lights were bright as they always were when we stopped the car.  i thought it could have been running directly off of the alternator to keep the lights bright but my experience and mechanics tell me that just an alternator could not keep the lights bright.  btw, our cell phone batteries were fine the next day which puts a damper on my magnetic field idea.

so, could you explain any of this?
content.summary: 2 sky anomalies - one burst of light then streak to ground, one light source casting glows and spotlights across desert

content.detailedDescription: Location johnsonville tenn. looked at the johnsonville bridge watching cars go over it. out of no were i saw round red lights in the sky over the tree tops go up in the sky and disaper. i thought at first it was flairs. but was not. i was on a towboat at the time when i saw it. i was shocked at first. i would see two or three in the sky at a time on and off go high then be gone. this lasted about five mins.I lost sight behind the island at the t.V.A. plant.
content.summary: Round sphere with red lights

content.detailedDescription: Was outside of my house smoking a cigaret, happened to look up in a westerly direction, saw a perfect cube shaped object pulsating a red color. it was about the size of my thumb held at arms length.I think it was very high up because below it a passenger jet was leaving a contrail.Watched it hover, it was spinning, at about two minutes it started to eject what looked like molten red metal i could not beleive what i was seeing do not really beleive in ufos because of the distances involved from one star to another. all of a sudden the cube changed shape to a triangle and shot off at an incredible speed to the west. what freeked me out it that it didnt leave any contrail.Within one second it was out of sight. unless the government has technology 500 years ahead of what they tell us i truly beleive i witnessed a ufo.
content.summary: Pulsating red cube shaped object that spitted out molten metal,changed shape, and flew off at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription:
Heber/overgaard, az
lat.= 34. 25. 53. n
lon.= 110. 35. 36 w

observed a bright white, round, silent, object moving slowly west.

on saturday february 11, 2006 at about 5:45 in the morning a friend who was visiting for the weekend decided to step outside and take a look at the morning sky. i was busy making the coffee when he came in quite astounded and excited at what he had just witnessed.
he said he was enjoying the views of the winter skies when all of a sudden a brilliant white, round, light appeared directly north and at approximately 70��� alt. above the horizon moving slowly west. i asked him if he was holding something at arms length between his thumb and index finger that would represent the objects size what would it be? he said, without hesitation, ���about the size of a bb���.
one of the strangest things about it, he said, was that when it appeared it was already moving ���as if it decided to just appear as it was moving slowly west���. he stated that it made no sound or changed it���s direction of travel. after observing it for about 30 seconds or so he said he picked up the faint sound of a jet and then he saw it pop up over the trees in the west. when  he glanced back over to the object it had stopped moving.  after just a few seconds the object headed north at an incredible speed and disappeared below the horizon. he said he tried to count down the seconds using the 001 method as it moved away from the jet but never made it to the second zero.
our friend has always been a true blue skeptic about these things, but now as he states, ���i���m not so sure about this anymore���. 
this is the second, close to identical, sighting of this object from our property in six months. i filed an incident report last september 30, 2005 that was an identical match to this one except that object was literally on top of us. it���s color, shape, point of origin (north), and direction and speed of departure (north) were the same.
i have no idea what this object is, where it came from, or what it���s interest is in this area but my curiosity is now getting the best of me. i would like to find out how many other sightings have taken place that have not been reported.
please feel free to contact me. 

sincerely, 
ron firestone
ronsue1@frontiernet.Net
928-535-9115
content.summary: A bright white, round, silent, object the size of a bb at arms length slowly moving west.

content.detailedDescription:
I have always looked into "forbidden" or "taboo" subject matters, studied religions, mythologies, legends, etc.

during this time period (i can't be certain of the dates, but i believe it was in feb. or mar. of 2004), i had been reading "the dulce papers" online, & seemed to find alot of answers to questions & just generally helped me piece together alot of events/encounters i've witnessed/experienced.

late one night (actually, it was around 3-4am), i was sharing a few of these details with my girlfriend on her computer (which was about 5 feet away from the bathroom). while i was speaking with her about some of the specific details i found some sense & reason with, there was a sudden silence, then, i paused (feeling something unsettleing), then, something fell into the sink (in the bathroom a few feet away).
   i had a feeling (at that time) that i had been under closer observation than before (i don't want to sound paranoid, but i've actually got some collaborating witnesses, who don't realize what exactally they've been near...Sorry to be so vague...Don't want to write too much without knowing who's on the recieving end).
  after hearing something "fall" into the sink, i said something (to anything that might be in there), waited (was actually pretty scared, my adrenaline was definately flowing), after about 30 - 45 seconds, we heard a whirling kind of sound (difficult to describe) that neither of us had ever heard before, but thjere was no doubt what that sound was (this apartment building was about 1/2 block long, the sound cam from the side where the bbq's are...There's nowhere close by that could've justified this sound...Too far from street).
i then phoned the local police (which, by the way, was right across the street...Maybe 150-200 yards away).
i requested a unit to do a quick drive through the alley & surrounding area of the building. when asked to state what i thought the sound came from, i replied that i'd rather not state an opinion, but that i knew what it was...The officer did not sound surprised or even curious for some reason (it struck me as rather odd, seen as how this city would not be the kind of place where anyone would expect for something like this to take place...You'd have to know glendale, i guess).

there is, of curse, some significance (i believe) with other times i've witnessed/experienced/noticed.

**somewhat related...I'm attaching a digital sketch (or painting) i did freehand, from scratch in the program "corel painter ix" about 6 months ago. although, i never saw a being during the event described above, this is aomeone/aomething i had encountered for 5 or 6 consecutive nights in 2001 (approx. 20 sec. ea.), then once more early morning, a few months later.

i have reason to believe that there are some important details i may have, to somehow help, inform (or something...).

**side note - i am a two time emmy award winning animator, not some bored paranoid freak (i may be a freak, but that's just me...Lol).

if someone can contact me, i'd apreciate it.
thank you,
-jm
content.summary: Felt presence in my apartment (somewhat expected), something was "bumped" in the bathroom a few feet away, then i spoke (knew someone/thing was there), then, approx. 45 sec. later, my g.F. & i heard sound never heard before, with no doubt of it's source.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was the captain of a commercial airliner.
2. the contrail of another aircraft.
3. unknown
4. very small metallic stationary object at very high altitude, possibly rectangular. 
5. pointed it out to the first officer, who also saw it. queried air traffic control. atc then proceeded to ask us a few questions, mainly if was moving and and est. alitude. atc then contacted the military to query them if they had anything up there, to which they responded that they didn't.
6. got busy in the flight and job duties at hand took priority.
content.summary: Very small metallic stationary object at very high altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was drivin back from las vegas to mesquite nv. off to east was a disc shaped craft with lights moving in a circle around it. it had wavy like marage heat coming down to the ground. severa other cars stopped to observe. it hovered for several min.And shot up in the air and dissapared.
content.summary: Off of highway to the east .Several cars and myself pulled over to see.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a house and never smoke inside for this reason i spent 5-15 minutes, sometimes more, every hour outside, smoking. i love to look at the sky to watch stars full of mistery and scientific puzzles, hopping to see ufo. and suddenly i saw that cluster of stars (8 - 10 stars) moving from nw to se. my first impression was that this is illusion created by moving light clouds below the stars. but then i noticed that the cluster changes its position in relation to the stars. it was one object 1 - 2 meters in diameter but not circle may be elips. it is difficult to describe beacause the object itself was like a ghost, invisible, only weak lights around its conture could tell you that this object is solid and huge and it was moving.
it was not flying saurce, it was mothership, that is how impressive it was. i could watch the object, moving with the speed equal or may be more than the speed of jet plane,  only for 10-20 seconds because i have limitted view of the sky there are trees on my backyard. i came home and told my wife that i saw ufo.
  one week later i was smoking again on my deck. it was around 8 p.M. i looked at the sky and i could not believe to my eyes: i saw the same ghost, on the same altitude, moving this time in opposite direction from se to nw with the same speed. at the moment i saw the object it produced a flush light with size 0.3 - 0.5 meters for half second, like falling meteorit in atmosphere, that made me blind for a moment (1 second). as in the first time i followed this object for 10 - 15 seconds and it went beynd my view.
it is not the end of the story.
one week later + - couples day more less, i was smoking again on my deck. it was around 8 p.M. i lighted the cigarett and looked at the sky. and suddenly i saw the same object was moving with great speed from nw to se. if before the object covered this distance for 10 -20 seconds this time it took him 1 - 2 seconds. i was just lucky to be in the right place at the right time to witness this event. from theory of probability my story sounds unbelievable but this is true. about my credentials one can visit my web page http://mars.Superlink.Net/~dialect/.
sincerely,
ilya stavinsky
content.summary: I was lucky: i saw this object three times within 2.5 - 3 weeks 02/27/2006 - 03/12/2006. 1st and 2nd time for 5 - 10 seconds, 3d time for 1-2 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the event i was putting out the trash. i first noticed something in the corner of my eye, i then ran and got my camera. the object seemed to be hovering over the trees.
content.summary: Ufo! back over cleethorpes

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside of my back door and looked up in the northern sky and saw three lights-about the size of stars.  they would light up and then turn off.  then they separated into different directions.  with lights turning on and off in short intervals.  then they disappeared altogether.  i called my husband when i first saw them and he witnessed them also.  they were an yellow-orangish color.  at first i thought it they were planes or something and going through clouds.  but there were no clouds and the stars were clearly visible.  they were moving at a high rate of speed when the separated.  at first they were hovering.  i thought we should report the event to someone.  so i just looked on line and found this site.   i've never seen this type of thing before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw 3 blinking lights (would stay lit and then turn off completely).  they were in closs proximity and then separated into different directions.

content.detailedDescription: Taking my dog outside.  my roommate was outside smoking and pointed it out to me and asked me what i thought it was.  at first i thought it was a bunch of balloons twirling in the wind or perhaps the goodyear blimp.  it moved slowly from the south to the north.  it glowed very dimly orange.  as it came closer we could tell it mas much further up in the sky than previously thought.  it appeared to be 4 globes circling around each other.  after crossing the sky it started to rise and just kept rising.  we watched until it became as faint as a star and then disappeared.  there was no sound.  i tried to get it on video camera but the batteries were dead.  i have always been a skeptic and know i wasn't dreaming... i certainly hadnt been drinking, plus i wasnt the first to see it.  i am sure there is a logical explanation.  perhaps someone else saw the same thing.  i still don't know what to think.  i have a rocket scientist friend from jpl / nasa .  she is going to look into it some more.
content.summary: Slow moving rotating dim glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee and i were taking a walk through our neighborhood (windsor hills) and looking at the stars. i glanced at orion and was looking for the faint glow of the pleiades, when i noticed what appeared to be a constellation of lights cruise through the sky. immediately, i asked my fiancee to observe the phenomenon.

it then followed that we saw 3 v-shaped objects flying se, though they could have been triangular. they were silent, and their distance and dimensions couldn't be determined, though they must have been quite large when compared to commercial aircraft (perhaps 5 to 10 times the size) flying at a comparable altitude.

the craft almost had a translucent appearance, though the front edge seemed luminous (almost as if hazy, glowing lights or a "string of stars" had been strung across the front). each object remained visible for 5 to 10 seconds, and it appeared that they flew with their points facing downward. we lost sight of them, as the tree line blocked our ability to follow the craft to the horizon.

we saw the first one at about 7:30pm then walked to a less light-polluted area for better viewing. about five minutes later two more objects appeared and flew in the same direction.

though, we spotted three craft, chances are that there could have been more. after spotting the first one, we moved to a spot that was less affected by light-pollution, which may have taken three to five minutes. upon reaching the new locale, we spotted two more craft. perhaps there could have been other craft that we missed during the interim.

it was difficult to spot the craft initially, because it was as if they were "stealthed" in some way -- as if they were blending in with their surroundings. had we not been looking at the stars, and had it not been a clear night, chances are we would not have noticed the craft. in addition to their luminous glow, there was an ethereal nature to them, and they seemed to cruise entirely silently and steadily, with no apparent change in direction.
content.summary: 3 luminous chevron-like objects silently cruising.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a park with two friends i observed a cigar shaped object metalic in color going from e/w pretty hi up... the next thing i knew it was directly over head the size of a street light tellow in color and not a sound.It hovered over us for about 4 seconds by the time i turned my head westit was the size of a star it paused and made a 90 degree turn north where it dipped and shot up and dipped and shot up again and it was gone...I had one other incident in the fall of 92 in missouri i was in a rural visitors house in a secluded area i woke to the dogs barking raised to my left sholder facing 3 luvered windows which were open and heard the tune from close encounters of the third kind and said to myself oh no...( i was a chicago policeman then) all i remember is falling asleep immediatelly..The next day i noticed a nark on my left calf..I picked at it and some little copper or brass came out.I still hsve the scar that itches occasionally..Ty..I just wanted to document these events..Ps i did call the air force on the first event and they said kid it was a weather baloon!!!The report was in the local paper southtown economist..Thanks again,,, jack
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was in a park in chicago with two friends i was sitting and saw a metalic cigar shaped object flying from e/w next thing i noticed it was the size of a street light yellow in color and hovered ov

content.detailedDescription: I woke up and looked out to see an extremly brigt object that appeared to be changing shape and color. as i watched, this object appeared to be moving very slowly higher in the sky. occasionally i would see a red dot ant to top of the shape which seemed vertically oblong. i got my digital camera, went otside, zoom in and took two 3.5 megapixel photos about a minute apart.When i process the photos on my computer, and blew them up it was appearant that this was some type of ufo. i have saved the originals and am happy to submit them.
content.summary: Bright object , moving slowly, larger than a star changing shape and color.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the way into renselaer. it was night time and i saw these 12 lights in a row then i saw a green light in the middle! it was in the middle of a cornfield! im not sure if it was a ufo or not but i believe in ufo's and i talked to my friend and when she and her father dropped me off one night she saw the same thing but not the green lights! that night when i saw that ufo or w/e it was i kept staring at it and the light would fade in and out but it wouldn't dissapear! i never took my eyes off of it! i asked my dad what it was but he said he didnt know! i lost sight of the object when i got into town where all the stores and houses were! on my way back home i didnt see it. im not sure where i was b/c i didnt pay attention i never took my eyes off of the ufo!
content.summary: It had 12 lights in a row and a green light in the middle

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were standing in my driveway and we were talking, as we were enjoying the evening (alchohol and drugs were not an issue) we looked up to the northern sky,enjoying the clear night and stars. then we noticed a light moving very fast but that was not all, it was followed by another fast light and yet another. they completely stopped, times three and moved in sequence across the north to the east and completely dissapeared. we both swore to each other we would never speak of it as everyone would make fun of us anyway. so we never did till now. i have had experiences all of my life and my daughter as a 15 mo old baby told me one night that little people took her up, i just freaked out and i really think she was better with it at the time than me as i have had something going on most of my life. when i have talked about it with family and coworkers i think that they all think im crazy.
i did go to a mufon meeting in rockford in 1988, mostly because what happened to my daughter. the people there were veterens of the war and their wives and the man from chicago mufon would have liked to talk to me more but i was afraid. i have a lot more to say now that im older and wiser.
content.summary: Three very fast shapes that made exact stops three times across the northern sky

content.detailedDescription: This sighting was about 45 degrees of the horizon , 10 degrees sse.  object moved very erratically in triangular flight paths.  rapid short bursts of movement at extremely sharp angles of change of direction indicated this was to me a possible ufo.  odd thing was that ten to fifteen antenna gradually migrated out of the main body of the vehicle.  object had the appearance of a spider when antenna were fully extended.  antennae were about 5 times longer than the main vehicle.  antennae gradually withdrew and vehicle vaporized away.
content.summary: Star like object , spider like appendages migrating gradually out of the main body vehicle.

content.detailedDescription: We (my dad, 2 brothers, sister and i) were siting and talking in the livingroom in bogota, colombia. there was no power in the neiborhood, my dad was sitting forward the window when he saw something that kept his atention, we look in that direction. there were 3 green lights, floating in the sky not to far from us, suddenly they changed positions very fast but they ketp the same line, we went out to see it better we didin't even talk to each other, we were amazed about it. they were there for about 15 min. after they left, we started to talk, we all knew they were ufos... when thry left it seen like they just disappear
content.summary: 3 green and shine circles

content.detailedDescription: I was in brussels visiting my girlfriend and i was lying in bed staring out the window at the full moon in the early hours of the morning.  i started looking for stars, expecting none, as the moon was very bright and full.  however, i saw one light off in the distance past the trees outside the window.  the object seemed at first to be a plane or a satellite.  the object then seemed to go in and out of focus.  i was sure this was because i was tired and could not sleep.  then the object appeared to be a flashlight up in the sky being shaken back and forth very quickly.  then the object completely stabilized and became a perfect sphere.  then i was sure it was a planet (mars?) ands that my eyes were playing tricks on me.  however, this sequence of events (more or less, but not exactly) repeated itself, i got out of bed and got the camcorder.  thinking back on this, this is very strange as i have never done anything like that before, not with a camera or a camcorder.  this woke my girlfriend and she asked what i was doing.  when i told her, she put her glasses on and stared out at the object.  i asked her what she thought it was.  with neither of us having any idea what we were seeing, she suggested i open the window and try shooting directly into the early morning sky.  by this time the birds were chirping and it was twilight.  this made it easier to see the tree branches as points of reference and it seemed clear that this object in the sky was moving in a very unusual way that i had never seen before.   eventually, i got tired of shooting, put away the camera and got back into bed.  as daylight came, the object became harder and harder to see.  i have the camcorder minidv cassete tape, but would like to get it back.
content.summary: Perfect sphere became a squiggly light that moved very suddenly and became a sphere again.  object would disappear and reappear and shake vigorously

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside my house in port st. lucie, fl about 9 pm sunday, march 12th, 2006 to go to the store and noticed a lighted but hazy object with a blinking light on top.  it did not have the shape or movements of a fixed-wing or helicopter so that made me notice it.  (i was in the air force and have seen many planes.)  hard to tell the size and distance but apparently it was several hundred feet off the ground. it came from the east and seemed to lose some altitude before levelling off.  it then flew north.  i paralled it's course in my car but it was over an area west of the town, over farms i believe, and i couldn't get close.  i thought it could have been a blimp but they don't usually fly at night around here and they are based south of here.  i also don't see why it would fly over an unpopulated area of the county since blimps are mainly used for advertising.  boca raton might be the closest airship base.  i couldn't really see if it was blimp-shaped.  blimps usually have moving lights along the sides to advertise something.  the lights on this seemed to be steady except for the one on top.  all the lighting on it seemed to be white including the blinking light on top.  many other drivers were on the road and could have seen it.  it kept flying north till i lost sight of it.  if it was the size of a blimp then it could have been moving at about 50 or more mph.  i was somewhat excited when chasing it in my car, thinking that i may be witnessing something special but also aware that it's more than likely terrestial such as a blimp.  there were several hot air ballons flying around here this morning but i don't believe they would fly at night and are therefore not lighted.  after i lost sight of it i continued with my errands and then came home to write this.
content.summary: Lighted but hazy and distant object, possibly blimp-shaped (or a blimp) flying north approximately 50 mph.
